animeTitle: Nobunaga no Shinobi: Nobunaga to Minarai Shinobi
animeDescription: Oda Nobunaga saves a girl from drowning one day. She clumsily tells him that she's a shinobi. Instead of attempting to kill him, she swears to serve him one day after hearing his plans to unify Japan.(Source: Crunchyroll)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Nobunaga no Shinobi', 'Parent story: Nobunaga no Shinobi']
